presentation.slide:
this is the chachi_presenter
it´s a slide presenter that simulates an old console.
all green and stuff

this is a simple slide.
slides and all configuration needs to be created at pres.xml on the data folder
you just need to write some text. (use the return character to lift the text on the screen)

the "type" attribute specifies which kind of slide you are creating:
plain - plain text (just like this one) flock - uses the processing flock example as background balloons - uses a new sketch as background sound - displays a sound reactive sketch as background

then... we have some other attributes to play with:
cls="true" clears the screen before the slide gets rendered.
hasimage="true" sets an image as background. you should also set the image name on the "imagename" attribute.
hasvideo="true" same deal here. remember to use "videoname" to set the video file name (use .mov´s)
